pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Comprehensive Collection of Neuroscience and Brain-Related Datasets // Offers a rich and diverse collection of datasets focused on the brain, nervous system, and related disorders. The package includes clinical, experimental, neuroimaging, behavioral, cognitive, and simulated data on conditions such as Parkinson's disease, Alzheimer's, epilepsy, schizophrenia, gliomas, and mental health. Datasets cover structural and functional brain data, neurotransmission, gene expression, cognitive performance, and treatment outcomes. Designed for researchers, neuroscientists, clinicians, psychologists, data scientists, and students, this package facilitates exploratory data analysis, statistical modeling, and hypothesis testing in neuroscience and neuroepidemiology.
